label: A7B12C_hR20_148_ade_2f_b-001
title: SrMn$_{7}$O$_{12}$ Structure
comments:
We use the data for SrMn$_{7}$O$_{12}$ taken at 295K.  Below 265K it undergoes an incommensurate structural transition. (Belik, 2016) 
 Some authors use CaMn$_{7}$O$_{12}$ as the prototype. 
 At high temperatures CaMn$_{7}$O$_{12}$ and PbMn$_{7}$O$_{12}$ transform into the \href{current_web_home_dir/A7BC12_cI40_204_bc_a_g-001}{NaMn$_{7}$O$_{12}$ structure}. 
 Hexagonal settings of this structure can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
